title: i've benn trying to log in for the past 2 hours and it's still on loading please help.
body: For some reason it's not letting me log in it just stays on loading forever.

replies.body: Do you have century link? This happens to me sometimes.

There might be a change in your connection settings that's having trouble reaching the authentication server, so it's likely to time out after a bit.  If this is still an issue, run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help!
